name: Shadows of Legacy - Beta
blurb: Immerse yourself into a deep, online, multi-player RPG without drowning in the theme-park MMO grind!

rewards.reward: PEASANT: You will receive 3 months of free game-play once the game comes out of Beta. All backers at every level receive access to our live project backlog and our recorded weekly status meetings.

CONSCRIPT VANGUARD (early bird backer): You will be among the first beta play-testers added in SoL, so you can secure your domain's name and place in Keveil before the world is opened to those of our realm. You will get the ****6 MONTHS of free game-play**** once the game comes out of Beta.

CONSCRIPT: You will be among the first beta play-testers added in SoL, so you can secure your domain's name and place in Keveil before the world is opened to those of our realm. You will also get the 3 months of free game-play once the game comes out of Beta.

PEDDLER PIONEER (early bird backer): You are also included in the beta play-tester list, plus your name or a name of your choosing (within our guidelines) will be mentioned in a major way within the game lore of SoL (this might be a long dead leader of a major domain that might still exist or if no longer existing, at least had a major impact on SoL's world). You will also get the ****6 MONTHS of free game-play**** once the game comes out of Beta.

PEDDLER: You are also included in the beta play-tester list, plus your name or a name of your choosing (within our guidelines) will be mentioned in a major way within the game lore of SoL (this might be a long dead leader of a major domain that might still exist or if no longer existing, at least had a major impact on SoL's world). You will also get the 3 months of free game-play once the game comes out of Beta.

MERCHANT or TAVERN KEEPER/WENCH PIONEER (early bird backer): You are also included in the beta play-tester list, and we will brainstorm with you to create a minor Non-Playing Character (NPC from here on) who will be loyal to your domain. You will also get the ****6 MONTHS of free game-play**** once the game comes out of Beta.

MERCHANT or TAVERN KEEPER/WENCH: You are also included in the beta play-tester list, and we will brainstorm with you to create a minor Non-Playing Character (NPC from here on) who will be loyal to your domain. You will also get the 3 months of free game-play once the game comes out of Beta.

GUILD MEMBER SETTLER (early bird backer): You will be included in the late alpha testing. This is before any beta testers come into the game, plus you will brainstorm with us to create a major NPC who is a leader an NPC Domain. This domain will start the game as your ally. You will also get the ****6 MONTHS of free game-play**** once the game comes out of Beta.

GUILD MEMBER: You will be included in the late alpha testing. This is before any beta testers come into the game, plus you will brainstorm with us to create a major NPC who is a leader an NPC Domain. This domain will start the game as your ally. You will also get the 3 months of free game-play once the game comes out of Beta.

COUNCIL MEMBER - ELDER (early bird backer): You will be included in the late alpha testing, plus you will brainstorm with us to create a major NPC who is a leader an NPC Domain. This domain will start the game as your ally. You will be included in our regular future feature review sessions where you will get to make a case for what feature(s) we work on next. You will also get the ****6 MONTHS of free game-play**** once the game comes out of Beta.

COUNCIL MEMBER: You will be included in the late alpha testing, plus you will brainstorm with us to create a major NPC who is a leader an NPC Domain. This domain will start the game as your ally. You will be included in our regular future feature review sessions where you will get to make a case for what feature(s) we work on next. You will also get the 3 months of free game-play once the game comes out of Beta.

COUNCIL MEMBER - AMBASSADOR: You will be included in the late alpha testing, plus you will brainstorm with us to create a major NPC who is a leader an NPC Domain. This domain will start the game as your ally. You will be included in our regular future feature review sessions where you will get to make a case for what feature(s) we work on next. ****You will get forever free game-play for the existence of the game.****

INNER CIRCLE: You will be part of our earliest Alpha play-testers groups, so you get first dibs on your domain's name and place in the world, plus you will brainstorm with us to create a major NPC who will lead an NPC Domain. You will be included in our regular future feature review sessions where you will get to make a case for what feature(s) we work on next. You will also have access to us at different times were we will discuss the inner workings of the game and where it is headed in the future (these hangouts will probably happen before January 2013). You will get forever free game-play for the existence of the game.

EPIC DOMAIN: You will be part of our earliest Alpha play-testers groups, so you get first dibs on your domain's name and place in the world. You will be included in our regular future feature review sessions where you will get to make a case for what feature(s) we work on next. You will also have access to us through special Google Hangouts were we will discuss the inner workings of the game and where it is headed in the future (these hangouts will probably happen before January 2013). Once the game switches to beta your domain will also change dramatically. You will be a liege lord of a major house with player characters as vassals under you, or something similar for other types of domains. You will get forever free game-play for the existence of the game.

KING ANSEL'S ADVISER: You will have everything that EPIC DOMAIN level has plus you will be able to brainstorm with us about an over-arching meta-plot in SoL. We reserve the right to make changes to the plot at anytime. You will get forever free game-play for the existence of the game.

CREATOR: You will have everything that the KING ANSEL'S ADVISER level has in our world, plus you will work with us to create and run your own world with the Shadows of Legacy Game Engine for up to 5 players. This means you have the freedom to do whatever you want as long as the engine supports it. Extra players might be addable at the normal subscription costs...
